mapper.select: SELECT ${sequences} FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO (INTERF_NAME, URL, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, ORDER_NO, ID, REMARK, UPDATE_DATE, SRV_ORD_ID, RETURN_CONTENT) VALUES (#{INTERFNAME}, #{URL}, #{CONTENT}, sysdate, #{ORDERNO}, SEQ_GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{REMARK}, sysdate, #{SRV_ORD_ID}, #{RETURNCONTENT})
INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO (INTERF_NAME, URL, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, ORDER_NO, ID, REMARK) VALUES (#{INTERFNAME}, #{URL}, #{CONTENT}, sysdate, #{ORDERNO}, #{ID}, #{REMARK})
INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_CLOB_INFO (ID, TABLE_NAME, CODE, CLOB_VALUE) values (#{ID}, #{TABLE_NAME}, #{CODE}, #{CLOB_VALUE})
mapper.select: SELECT remark FROM gom_BDW_code_info WHERE CODE_CONTENT = '${type}' and CODE_TYPE = 'interface_url'

select gbsoi.TRADE_ID,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID CRMORDERCODE,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.FLOW_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_OFFER_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_ID, gbsoi.SERIAL_NUMBER,to_char(gbsoi.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')as CREATE_DATE, gbsoi.ACTIVE_TYPE,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.ORDER_TYPE,dept.REGION_ID, gbco.SUBSCRIBE_ID,gbco.DEAL_AREA_CODE,gbco.CUST_ID,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME,gbco.HANDLE_DEP_ID, gbco.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, gbco.CUST_TEL, gbco.CUST_ADDRESS,'bendi' as CIRCUIT_LEVEL, gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL,gbco.REMARK,gbsoi.service_id|| '-' ||gbsoi.USER_ID ,gbsoai.ATTR_ACTION,gbsoai.ATTR_CODE,gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE,gbsoai.ATTR_NAME ,gbsoi.INSTANCE_ID as PRODINSTID,attr.ATTR_VALUE as NEED_FINISH_TIME,gbsoi.RESOURCES from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO gbsoi left join gom_bdw_cst_ord gbco on gbsoi.CST_ORD_ID = gbco.CST_ORD_ID left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and gbsoai.ATTR_CODE='20000223' left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info attr on attr.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE='20000073' left join department dept on gbco.handle_dep_id=dept.dept_id where gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID = ${id}

select gbsoi.TRADE_ID,INFO.relate_info_id CRMORDERCODE,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.FLOW_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_OFFER_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_ID, gbsoi.SERIAL_NUMBER,to_char(gbsoi.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')as CREATE_DATE, gbsoi.ACTIVE_TYPE,INFO.relate_info_id AS SRV_ORD_ID,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.ORDER_TYPE,'ergan_bendi' as CIRCUIT_LEVEL, gbco.SUBSCRIBE_ID,gbco.DEAL_AREA_CODE,gbco.CUST_ID,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME,gbco.HANDLE_DEP_ID, gbco.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, gbco.CUST_TEL, gbco.CUST_ADDRESS,s.id REGION_ID, gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL,gbco.REMARK,gbsoi.service_id|| '-' ||gbsoi.USER_ID ,gbsoai.ATTR_ACTION,gbsoai.ATTR_CODE,gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE,gbsoai.ATTR_NAME ,INFO.INSTANCE_ID as PRODINSTID,attr.ATTR_VALUE as NEED_FINISH_TIME from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO gbsoi LEFT JOIN gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info info ON INFO.srv_ord_id = GBSOI.srv_ord_id AND INFO.cst_ord_id = GBSOI.cst_ord_id left join gom_bdw_cst_ord gbco on gbsoi.CST_ORD_ID = gbco.CST_ORD_ID left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and gbsoai.ATTR_CODE='20000223' left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info attr on attr.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE='20000073' LEFT JOIN gom_area_s s ON to_char(info.region_id)=to_char(s.alias) where INFO.relate_info_id = ${id}

select gbsoi.TRADE_ID,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID CRMORDERCODE,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.FLOW_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_OFFER_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_ID, gbsoi.SERIAL_NUMBER,to_char(gbsoi.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')as CREATE_DATE, gbsoi.ACTIVE_TYPE,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.ORDER_TYPE, gbco.SUBSCRIBE_ID,gbco.DEAL_AREA_CODE,gbco.CUST_ID,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME,gbco.HANDLE_DEP_ID, gbco.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL,gbco.REMARK,gbsoi.service_id|| '-' ||gbsoi.USER_ID ,gbsoai.ATTR_ACTION,gbsoai.ATTR_CODE,gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE,gbsoai.ATTR_NAME ,gbsoi.INSTANCE_ID as PRODINSTID,attr.ATTR_VALUE as NEED_FINISH_TIME from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW gbsoi left join gom_bdw_cst_ord gbco on gbsoi.CST_ORD_ID = gbco.CST_ORD_ID left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and gbsoai.ATTR_CODE='20000223' left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info attr on attr.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE='20000073' where gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID = ${id} and gbsoi.ORDER_ID = ${orderId}

select gbsoi.TRADE_ID,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID CRMORDERCODE,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.FLOW_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_OFFER_ID,gbsoi.SERVICE_ID, gbsoi.SERIAL_NUMBER,to_char(gbsoi.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')as CREATE_DATE, gbsoi.ACTIVE_TYPE,gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID,gbsoi.TRADE_TYPE_CODE,gbsoi.ORDER_TYPE, gbco.SUBSCRIBE_ID,gbco.DEAL_AREA_CODE,gbco.CUST_ID,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME,gbco.HANDLE_DEP_ID, gbco.CUST_NAME_CHINESE, gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL,gbco.CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL,gbco.REMARK,gbsoi.service_id|| '-' ||gbsoi.USER_ID ,gbsoai.ATTR_ACTION,gbsoai.ATTR_CODE,gbsoai.ATTR_VALUE,gbsoai.ATTR_NAME ,gbsoi.INSTANCE_ID as PRODINSTID,attr.ATTR_VALUE as NEED_FINISH_TIME from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW gbsoi join gom_order gord on gbsoi.ORDER_ID=gord.order_id or gbsoi.ORDER_ID=gord.parent_order_id join gom_wo gw on gw.order_id=gord.order_id left join gom_bdw_cst_ord gbco on gbsoi.CST_ORD_ID = gbco.CST_ORD_ID left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info gbsoai on gbsoai.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and gbsoai.ATTR_CODE='20000223' left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_attr_info attr on attr.SRV_ORD_ID= gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID and attr.ATTR_CODE='20000073' where gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID = ${id} and gw.wo_id=${wo_id}

SELECT DISTINCT A.ATTR_NAME,RS.ATTR_NAME AS ATTR_CODE,A.ATTR_ACTION, CASE WHEN B.SELECTSTAT = 1 and A.ATTR_CODE='10001105' and srv.RESOURCES='jike' THEN nvl((SELECT CODE_CONTENT FROM gom_BDW_code_info WHERE CODE_TYPE='10001105' AND CODE_VALUE = A.ATTR_VALUE),A.ATTR_VALUE) WHEN B.SELECTSTAT = 1 and A.ATTR_CODE='10001105' and srv.RESOURCES='localBuild' THEN nvl((SELECT CODE_CONTENT FROM gom_BDW_code_info WHERE CODE_TYPE='10001102' AND CODE_VALUE = A.ATTR_VALUE),A.ATTR_VALUE) WHEN B.SELECTSTAT = 1 and A.ATTR_CODE!='10001105' THEN nvl((SELECT CODE_CONTENT FROM gom_BDW_code_info WHERE CODE_TYPE = A.ATTR_CODE AND CODE_VALUE = A.ATTR_VALUE),A.ATTR_VALUE) WHEN B.SELECTSTAT IS NULL THEN A.ATTR_VALUE END AS ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO A JOIN GOM_BDW_RES_SWITCH RS ON RS.ATTR_CODE = A.ATTR_CODE LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_DIS_VIEW srv ON a.SRV_ORD_ID=srv.SRV_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_PROPERTY_INFO B ON A.ATTR_CODE = B.PROPERTY_ID AND B.IS_SHOW = 'Y' and b.srv_id=srv.SERVICE_ID
WHERE A.SRV_ORD_ID = ${id} AND RS.ATTR_CODE IS NOT NULL
select act_type from gom_bdw_operate_type where bus_code = #{typeCode}
select dept_id from gom_bdw_city_tras_depart where area_code = #{areaCode}
select count(1) from gom_bdw_code_info where code_type='order_rule_province' and code_value = #{provinceA}
select count(1) from gom_bdw_code_info where code_type='order_rule_province_sdwan' and code_value = #{role_province}
select count(1) from gom_bdw_code_info where code_type='order_rule_product' and code_value = #{service_id_real}
SELECT * from gom_BDW_code_info where code_type=#{codeType} and code_value=#{codeValue}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_ORDER SET REQ_FIN_DATE=to_date(#{reqFindate},'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE ORDER_ID=#{orderId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO (ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, SOURSE, CREATE_DATE,OLD_ATTR_VALUE) values (#{ATTR_INFO_ID}, #{SRV_ORD_ID}, #{ATTR_ACTION}, #{ATTR_CODE}, #{ATTR_NAME}, #{ATTR_VALUE}, #{ATTR_VALUE_NAME}, #{SOURSE}, sysdate, #{OLD_ATTR_VALUE})

SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO (ATTR_INFO_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, SOURSE, CREATE_DATE,OLD_ATTR_VALUE) SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_VALUE_NAME, SOURSE, sysdate,OLD_ATTR_VALUE from (
SELECT #{soa.SRV_ORD_ID} SRV_ORD_ID , #{soa.ATTR_ACTION} ATTR_ACTION, #{soa.ATTR_CODE} ATTR_CODE, #{soa.ATTR_NAME} ATTR_NAME, #{soa.ATTR_VALUE} ATTR_VALUE, #{soa.ATTR_VALUE_NAME} ATTR_VALUE_NAME, #{soa.SOURSE} SOURSE, #{soa.OLD_ATTR_VALUE} OLD_ATTR_VALUE FROM dual
) t

insert into GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_GRP (ORD_ATTR_GRP_ID, SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_GRP_ID, ATTR_GRP_CODE, ATTR_GRP_NAME, ATTR_GRP_STAT, ORD_ATTR_STATE, CREATE_DATE) values (#{ORD_ATTR_GRP_ID}, #{SRV_ORD_ID}, #{ATTR_GRP_ID}, #{ATTR_GRP_CODE}, #{ATTR_GRP_NAME}, #{ATTR_GRP_STAT}, #{ORD_ATTR_STATE}, sysdate)

insert into GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_GRP_INFO (ATTR_GRP_INFO_ID, ORD_ATTR_GRP_ID, ATTR_ACTION, ATTR_CODE, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE,ATTR_VALUE_NAME, SOURSE, CREATE_DATE) values (#{ATTR_GRP_INFO_ID}, #{ORD_ATTR_GRP_ID}, #{ATTR_ACTION}, #{ATTR_CODE}, #{ATTR_NAME}, #{ATTR_VALUE}, #{ATTR_VALUE_NAME}, #{SOURSE}, sysdate)

insert into gom_BDW_attach_info (attach_info_id, SRV_ORD_ID,FILE_ID,FILE_NAME,FILE_PATH,FILE_TYPE,WO_ORD_ID,FILE_SIZE,create_date,ORIGIN) values (SEQ_GOM_BDW_ATTACH_INFO.nextval+1, #{SRV_ORD_ID}, #{FILE_ID}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_TYPE}, #{WO_ORD_ID}, #{FILE_SIZE}, sysdate,#{ORIGIN})

SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO (attr_info_id, srv_ord_id, attr_action, attr_code, attr_name, attr_value, attr_value_name, create_date, sourse) VALUES (SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.nextval,#{srv_ord_id},#{attr_action},#{attr_code},#{attr_name},#{attr_value},#{attr_value_name},sysdate,#{sourse})
mapper.select: SELECT SRV_ORD_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO_VIEW GBSOI JOIN GOM_ORDER ORD ON GBSOI.ORDER_ID=ORD.PARENT_ORDER_ID WHERE ORDER_ID=${id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND COMPID =#{compId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_INFO (RES_INFO_ID,SRV_ORD_ID,RESID,RESSPECID,RESNAME,AGGRRESID,AGGRRESSPEC,SEQ,ACTIONTYPE,RFSID,COMPID,RESOURCES,RESTYPE) values(SEQ_gom_bdw_srv_ord_res_info.nextval+1,#{srvOrdId},#{resId},#{resSpecId},#{resName},#{aggrResId},#{aggrResSpec},#{seq},#{actionType},#{rfsId},#{compId},#{resources},#{resType})
mapper.select: SELECT ATTR_VAL FROM GOM_ORDER_ATTR WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} and ATTR_ID=#{attrId}
SELECT GAS.CRM_REGION FROM GOM_ORG_S A JOIN GOM_AREA_S GAS ON GAS.ID=A.AREA_ID WHERE A.PARENT_ORG_ID =1 START WITH A.ORG_ID=#{0} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.PARENT_ORG_ID= A.ORG_ID
SELECT CRM_REGION from GOM_AREA_S where id like #{id}
SELECT GBSOAI.ATTR_INFO_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO GBSOAI WHERE GBSOAI.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND GBSOAI.ATTR_CODE='20000064'
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO SET ATTR_VALUE=#{circuitNo}, SOURSE='res',CREATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE ATTR_INFO_ID=#{attrInfoId}
UPDATE GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO SET ATTR_VALUE=#{circuitNo}, SOURSE='res',CREATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_CODE='20000064'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_CODE='20000064' AND SOURSE='res'
DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_ACTION=#{interfaceName}
DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_CODE=#{attrCode}
DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND COMPID =#{compId} and POSITION is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE (RES_ROUTE_ID,SRV_ORD_ID,RFSID,RESID,COMPID,ATTR_CODE,ATTR_VALUE,ATTR_NAME,RESOURCES,CREATE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE.NEXTVAL,#{srvOrdId},#{rfsId},#{resId},#{compId},#{attrCode},#{attrValue},#{attrName},#{resources},sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_CIRCUIT SET STATE='10X' WHERE SRV_ORD_ID=#{srvOrdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_CIRCUIT(ID,SRV_ORD_ID,CIRCUIT_NO,OPR_STATE_ID,OPR_STATE,ROUTE_INFO,STATE,CREATE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_RES_CIRCUIT.NEXTVAL,#{srvOrdId},#{circuitNo},#{oprStateId},#{oprState},#{routeInfo},'10A',SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO WHERE TRADE_ID=#{tradeId} AND FLOW_ID=#{flowId}

WITH allorder as (select distinct gor.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, gor.parent_order_id AS parent_order_id, gor.order_code AS order_code, gor.order_title AS order_title from gom_order gor, ( select t.order_id from gom_order t start with t.order_id = #{orderId} connect by prior t.order_id = t.parent_order_id union all /*查二干到本地的单子*/ select order_id from gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info where PARENT_ORDER_ID = #{orderId} union all select t.order_id from gom_order t where t.parent_order_id in (select order_id from gom_bdw_sec_local_relate_info where PARENT_ORDER_ID = #{orderId})) xx where xx.order_id = gor.order_id) SELECT A.*,ROWNUM from ( SELECT w.create_date, w.wo_id AS woId, o.ORDER_ID AS orderId, o.parent_order_id, o.order_code AS orderCode, o.order_title AS orderTitle, ut.id AS tacheId, case when ut.tache_name in ('资源分配', '数据制作', '资源施工') then substr(o.order_title, instr(o.order_title, '_') + 1, instr(o.order_title, '专业') - (instr(o.order_title, '_'))) || ut.tache_name else tache_name end as tache_name, case when (w.wo_state = '290000002' and w.deal_user_id is null and ut.tache_name like '%起租%') then '待起租' when (w.wo_state = '290000002' and w.deal_user_id is null) then '待签收'
else pds.pub_date_name end AS orderState, info.track_content, case when w.deal_user_id is not null then (select vw.phone_no from vw_pub_staff vw where vw.staff_id = w.deal_user_id) else (CASE WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000001' THEN (select to_char(USER_REAL_NAMES) from (select ORG_ID, wm_concat(USER_REAL_NAME||user_phone) USER_REAL_NAMES from gom_user_s gos GROUP BY gos.org_id) b where b.ORG_ID = w.DISP_OBJ_ID) WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000002' THEN (SELECT to_char(WM_CONCAT(v.user_name||v.phone_no)) FROM gom_staff_group_s gs LEFT JOIN gom_staff_group_rela_s grs ON grs.staff_group_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN vw_pub_staff v ON v.staff_id = grs.staff_id where gs.id = w.disp_obj_id GROUP BY gs.id) WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000003' THEN (select to_char(STAFF_NAME||phone) from bfm_staff where to_char(STAFF_ID) = w.DISP_OBJ_ID) END) end AS phone, case when w.deal_user_id is not null then (select vw.email from vw_pub_staff vw where vw.staff_id = w.deal_user_id) else '' end AS EMAIL, w.DEAL_USER_ID AS DEAL_USER_ID, pds.PUB_DATE_ID AS PUB_DATE_ID, CASE WHEN W.COMP_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (case when w.comp_user_id in ('-2000') then '系统管理员' else (select STAFF_NAME from bfm_staff where STAFF_ID = w.comp_user_id) end) WHEN W.COMP_USER_ID IS NULL AND W.DEAL_USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (select STAFF_NAME from bfm_staff where STAFF_ID = w.DEAL_USER_ID) WHEN W.DEAL_USER_ID IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000001' THEN (select to_char(USER_REAL_NAMES) from (select ORG_ID, wm_concat(USER_REAL_NAME) USER_REAL_NAMES from gom_user_s gos GROUP BY gos.org_id) b where b.ORG_ID = w.DISP_OBJ_ID) WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000002' THEN (SELECT to_char(WM_CONCAT(v.user_name)) FROM gom_staff_group_s gs LEFT JOIN gom_staff_group_rela_s grs ON grs.staff_group_id = gs.id LEFT JOIN vw_pub_staff v ON v.staff_id = grs.staff_id where gs.id = w.disp_obj_id GROUP BY gs.id) WHEN w.disp_obj_tye = '260000003' THEN (select STAFF_NAME from bfm_staff where STAFF_ID = w.DISP_OBJ_ID) END) END AS userName, case when w.wo_state='290000002' then '' else to_char(w.state_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') end as deal_date, case when w.wo_state='290000002' then '' ELSE to_char(round(w.state_date - w.create_date, 2), 'fm9990.00') END LIMIT_TIME,
CASE when w.wo_state='290000002' AND sysdate > w.REQ_FIN_DATE then '1' WHEN w.wo_state!='290000002' AND w.STATE_DATE > w.REQ_FIN_DATE then '1' ELSE '0' END OVERTIME
FROM GOM_WO w JOIN allorder o ON o.order_id = w.order_id LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S ws on ws.id = w.ps_id LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE ut on ut.id = ws.tache_id LEFT JOIN gom_BDW_log_info info on info.wo_ord_id = w.wo_id AND info.oper_type IN (4, 5, 11, 12) left join GOM_PUB_DATE_S pds on pds.pub_date_id = w.wo_state and pds.DF_TYPE = 'WO_STATE' WHERE w.disp_obj_id != -2000 and ut.id!='510101050' AND w.wo_id NOT IN (select wo.wo_id from GOM_WO wo where wo.DEAL_USER_ID is null and wo.comp_user_id is null AND wo.WO_STATE IN ('290000110', '290000004') and wo.order_id = o.order_id) order by 1) A

select attr.finishTime,attr.circuitCode,wo.DEAL_USER_ID ,cir.ROUTE_INFO,disp.DISPATCH_ORDER_NO,vps.USER_NAME from gom_bdw_srv_ord_info srv left join gom_wo wo on wo.order_id =srv.order_id and WO_STATE='290000002' left join (select a.srv_ord_id, a.circuitCode, a.finishTime from ((select SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_CODE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO) a pivot(MAX(a.attr_value) FOR attr_code IN ('20000064' circuitCode, 'CON0013' finishTime))) a ) attr on srv.srv_ord_id = attr.srv_ord_id left join gom_bdw_srv_ord_res_circuit cir on cir.srv_ord_id =srv.srv_ord_id and cir.state='10A' left join gom_bdw_dispatch_order disp on srv.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID = disp.DISPATCH_ORDER_ID left join vw_pub_staff vps on vps.staff_id = wo.DEAL_USER_ID where srv.srv_ord_id=#{srvOrdId}
select count(*) from GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO where srv_ord_id=#{srvOrdId} and attr_code='orderId' and attr_value=#{orderId}
SELECT ATTRVALUE_NAME FROM GOM_BDW_PROVINCE_CITY_CODE WHERE ATTR_CODE=#{cityCode}
select code_value as service_id from gom_bdw_relation_info where code_info = #{serviceId} and code_type = #{codeType}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SET INSTANCE_ID=#{prodInstId} WHERE SRV_ORD_ID=#{srvOrdId}
mapper.select: SELECT GBSOAI.ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO GBSOAI WHERE GBSOAI.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND GBSOAI.ATTR_CODE='21100001'

select '' TRADE_ID,ID CRMORDERCODE,'' TRADE_TYPE_CODE,'' FLOW_ID,'' SERVICE_OFFER_ID, SERVICE_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER,to_char(CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')as CREATE_DATE, '108' ACTIVE_TYPE,ID SRV_ORD_ID,'' TRADE_TYPE_CODE,'101' ORDER_TYPE,RES_REGION_ID REGION_ID, '' SUBSCRIBE_ID,'' DEAL_AREA_CODE, CUST_ID,LINK_MAN CUST_CONTACT_MAN_NAME,'' HANDLE_DEP_ID, '' CUST_NAME_CHINESE, '' CUST_TEL, '' CUST_ADDRESS,'bendi' as CIRCUIT_LEVEL, '' CUST_CONTACT_MAN_TEL,'' CUST_CONTACT_MAN_EMAIL,'' REMARK , INSTANCE_ID as PRODINSTID,'' NEED_FINISH_TIME,SYSTEM_RESOURCE RESOURCES,ADDRESS ADDR_NAME from GOM_BDW_RES_SUPPLEMENT_INFO where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND COMPID =#{compId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_INFO (RES_INFO_ID,SRV_ORD_ID,RESID,RESSPECID,RESNAME,AGGRRESID,AGGRRESSPEC,SEQ,ACTIONTYPE,RFSID,COMPID,RESOURCES,RESTYPE) values(SEQ_GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_INFO.nextval+1,#{srvOrdId},#{resId},#{resSpecId},#{resName},#{aggrResId},#{aggrResSpec},#{seq},#{actionType},#{rfsId},#{compId},#{resources},#{resType})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_ROUTE WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND COMPID =#{compId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_ROUTE (RES_ROUTE_ID,SRV_ORD_ID,RFSID,RESID,COMPID,ATTR_CODE,ATTR_VALUE,ATTR_NAME,RESOURCES,CREATE_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_GOM_BDW_SUPV_RES_ROUTE.NEXTVAL,#{srvOrdId},#{rfsId},#{resId},#{compId},#{attrCode},#{attrValue},#{attrName},#{resources},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT SRV_ORD_ID FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_STAT = '10F' and INSTANCE_ID = #{instanceId} order by SRV_ORD_ID desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOM_BDW_RES_SUPPLEMENT_INFO WHERE ID=#{srvOrdId}

SELECT SO.TRADE_ID,SAO.DEVICEFACTORY,SAO.BSN,SAO.DEVICEMODEL FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SO left join (select SRV_ORD_ID, ATTR_VALUE, ATTR_CODE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO) a pivot(MAX(a.attr_value) FOR attr_code IN ( 'deviceFactory' deviceFactory, 'deviceModel' deviceModel, 'BSN' BSN)) sao on sao.srv_ord_id=so.srv_ord_id where so.srv_ord_id = #{srvOrdId} and so.srv_ord_stat not in('10X','10F','10C')

SELECT SO.SRV_ORD_ID,WO.ORDER_ID,WO.WO_ID,WS.TACHE_ID FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info so LEFT JOIN GOM_ORDER O ON O.ORDER_ID = so.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_WO WO ON WO.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S WS ON WS.ID = WO.PS_ID LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE UT ON UT.ID = WS.TACHE_ID where so.trade_id = #{tradeId} and so.resources = 'cloudNetwork' and so.srv_ord_stat not in ('10F','10X','10C') ORDER BY so.create_date desc,wo.WO_ID desc

SELECT SO.SRV_ORD_ID, SO.SERIAL_NUMBER, SO.FLOW_ID,SO.TRADE_ID, SO.TRADE_ID_RELA, SO.ACTIVE_TYPE, SO.INSTANCE_ID, CO.SUBSCRIBE_ID, CO.SUBSCRIBE_ID_RELA FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SO JOIN GOM_BDW_CST_ORD CO ON CO.CST_ORD_ID = SO.CST_ORD_ID WHERE SO.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}

select glo.ORDER_NO, glo.CONTENT, glo.RETURN_CONTENT from GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO glo where 1=1 and glo.url = '/receiveJsonServiceIntf/interfaceBDW/receiveJson.spr' and glo.order_no = (select gbsoi.TRADE_ID from gom_bdw_cst_ord co join gom_bdw_srv_ord_info gbsoi on co.cst_ord_id=gbsoi.cst_ord_id where co.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId} and gbsoi.SRV_ORD_ID= #{srvOrdId}) and glo.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} order by glo.create_date
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_PROGRESS_INFO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into GOM_BDW_PROGRESS_INFO (ID, SUBSCRIBE_ID, SUBSCRIBE_ID_RELA, SERIAL_NUMBER, TRADE_ID, FLOW_ID, DESCR, PROGRESS_STAT,SYS_RESOURCE, CREATE_DATE) SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_PROGRESS_INFO.NEXTVAL, SUBSCRIBE_ID, SUBSCRIBE_ID_RELA, SERIAL_NUMBER, TRADE_ID, FLOW_ID, DESCR, PROGRESS_STAT, SYS_RESOURCE,sysdate from (
SELECT #{po.SUBSCRIBE_ID} SUBSCRIBE_ID , #{po.SUBSCRIBE_ID_RELA} SUBSCRIBE_ID_RELA, #{po.SERIAL_NUMBER} SERIAL_NUMBER, #{po.TRADE_ID} TRADE_ID, #{po.FLOW_ID} FLOW_ID, #{po.DESCR} DESCR, #{po.PROGRESS_STAT} PROGRESS_STAT,#{po.SYS_RESOURCE} SYS_RESOURCE FROM dual
) t
mapper.select: SELECT GPO.PROGRESS_STAT FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SO JOIN GOM_BDW_PROGRESS_INFO GPO ON GPO.SERIAL_NUMBER = SO.SERIAL_NUMBER AND GPO.TRADE_ID = SO.TRADE_ID WHERE SO.SRV_ORD_ID =#{srvOrdId}

SELECT SO.SRV_ORD_ID,WO.ORDER_ID,WO.WO_ID,WS.TACHE_ID FROM gom_bdw_srv_ord_info_view so LEFT JOIN GOM_ORDER O ON O.ORDER_ID = so.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_WO WO ON WO.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_PS_2_WO_S WS ON WS.ID = WO.PS_ID LEFT JOIN UOS_TACHE UT ON UT.ID = WS.TACHE_ID where so.srv_ord_id = #{srvOrdId} and so.srv_ord_stat not in ('10F','10X','10C')
ORDER BY so.create_date desc,wo.WO_ID desc
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND COMPID =#{compId} and POSITION=#{position}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE (RES_ROUTE_ID,SRV_ORD_ID,RFSID,RESID,COMPID,ATTR_CODE,ATTR_VALUE,ATTR_NAME,RESOURCES,CREATE_DATE,POSITION,SPECIALITY,OPR_STATE) VALUES(SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_RES_ROUTE.NEXTVAL,#{srvOrdId},#{rfsId},#{resId},#{compId},#{attrCode},#{attrValue},#{attrName},#{resources},sysdate,#{positon},#{speciality},#{oprState})
mapper.select: SELECT ORD.PS_ID,SRV.PARALLEL_FLAG FROM GOM_ORDER ORD JOIN GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SRV ON ORD.ORDER_ID = SRV.ORDER_ID WHERE SRV.SRV_ORD_ID =#{srvOrdId}
SELECT remark FROM GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO WHERE CODE_CONTENT = '${type}' and CODE_TYPE = 'interface_url'

select glo.ORDER_NO, glo.CONTENT, glo.RETURN_CONTENT from GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO glo where 1=1 and glo.url = 'webservice/construct/OssToConstructOrderSend' and glo.order_no = (select co.APPLY_ORD_ID from gom_bdw_cst_ord co where co.CST_ORD_ID = #{cstOrdId}) and glo.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} order by glo.create_date
select bu.user_id as staff_id,bu.user_name,bu.is_locked from bfm_user bu where bu.user_code=#{userCode} and bu.state='A'

SELECT '互联网专线' CIRCUIT_TYPE,C1.CODE_CONTENT CIRCUIT_RATE,C2.CODE_CONTENT NEED_RES_LIST,A.STD_ADDRESS_A ,C3.CODE_VALUE PROVINCE_A FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SOI LEFT JOIN (SELECT SOI.SRV_ORD_ID SRVORDIDINFO,ATTR.ATTR_CODE,ATTR.ATTR_VALUE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_INFO SOI LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO ATTR ON ATTR.SRV_ORD_ID = SOI.SRV_ORD_ID WHERE SOI.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_CODE IN ('CON0101','200002617','10001110','ORD10171') ) T PIVOT(MAX(T.ATTR_VALUE) FOR ATTR_CODE IN ('CON0101' PROVINCE_A,'200002617' STD_ADDRESS_A,'10001110' CIRCUIT_RATE,'ORD10171' NEED_RES_LIST)) A ON A.SRVORDIDINFO = SOI.SRV_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO C1 ON C1.CODE_TYPE='10001110' AND A.CIRCUIT_RATE=C1.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO C2 ON C2.CODE_TYPE='RES_HAVE' AND A.NEED_RES_LIST=C2.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN GOM_AREA_S AREA ON A.PROVINCE_A=AREA.NAME LEFT JOIN GOM_BDW_CODE_INFO C3 ON C3.CODE_TYPE='GOVERNMENT_PROVINCE_CODE' AND AREA.CRM_REGION=C3.REMARK WHERE SOI.SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId}
mapper.insert: insert into GOM_ORDER_ACTIVATE (activate_id, spec_name, feed_system, activate_code, activate_date, activate_desc, wo_id) values ( lpad(SEQ_GOM_ORDER_ACTIVATE.NEXTVAL, 24, 0), #{specName},#{feedSystem},#{activateCode}, sysdate,#{activateDesc},#{woId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_CODE = #{attrCode} AND ATTR_NAME = #{attrName}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_CONSTRUCT_TACHE.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into GOM_BDW_CONSTRUCT_TACHE (ID, SRV_ORD_ID,SERIAL_NUMBER,TRADE_ID, TACHE_NAME, PROC_STAFF, PROC_STAFF_TEL,PROC_STAFF_EMAIL,PROC_DESC, RECEIVE_TIME, REPLY_TIME, LIMIT_TIME, CREATE_DATE) SELECT SEQ_GOM_BDW_CONSTRUCT_TACHE.NEXTVAL, SRV_ORD_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER,TRADE_ID, TACHE_NAME, PROC_STAFF, PROC_STAFF_TEL, PROC_STAFF_EMAIL, PROC_DESC, RECEIVE_TIME, REPLY_TIME, LIMIT_TIME, sysdate from (
SELECT #{soa.srvOrdId} SRV_ORD_ID , #{soa.serialNumber} SERIAL_NUMBER, #{soa.tradeId} TRADE_ID, #{soa.tacheName} TACHE_NAME, #{soa.procStaff} PROC_STAFF, #{soa.procStaffTel} PROC_STAFF_TEL, #{soa.procStaffEmail} PROC_STAFF_EMAIL, #{soa.procDesc} PROC_DESC, to_date(#{soa.receiveTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') RECEIVE_TIME, to_date(#{soa.replyTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') REPLY_TIME, #{soa.limitTime} LIMIT_TIME FROM dual
) t
